title: Downtown San Diego Homeless Sleepers
description: Five years of monthly geographic positions for homeless sleepers in Downtown San Diego
name: sandiegodata.org-dowtown_homeless-8

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date of count. Only the month and year are significant.

fields.name: east_village
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: city_center
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: columbia
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: marina
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: cortez
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: gaslamp
fields.description: Neighborhood count

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date of total. Only the year and month are significant

fields.name: count
fields.description: Total count

fields.name: neighborhood
fields.description: Neighborhood, from the label on the source map

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date of the observation. Many dates have no know day of month; for these dates, the day of month is set to 1

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of sleeper: individual, vehicle or structure

fields.name: temp
fields.description: Temperature, if it was written on the source map

fields.name: rain
fields.description: Rain or clear, if it was written on the source map

fields.name: geoid
fields.description: Census geoid for the 2010 Census block the observation is in, in ACS format

fields.name: x
fields.description: X geographic position, in California State Plane 6, EPSG:2230

fields.name: y
fields.description: Y geographic position, in California State Plane 6, EPSG:2230

fields.name: geometry
fields.description: Geographic position of observation, in Lat/Lon, EPSG:4326
